00027 #ifndef _FREEBUS_ATMEGA168P_H
00028 #define _FREEBUS_ATMEGA168P_H ///< is defined if target system is the ATMega168P

00030 /*************************************************************************
00031 * INCLUDES
00032 *************************************************************************/
00033 #include <inttypes.h>
00034 #include <avr/io.h>
00035 #include <avr/eeprom.h>
00036 #include <avr/pgmspace.h>
00037 #include <avr/interrupt.h>

00039 #include <avr/sleep.h>
00040 #include <util/parity.h>
00041 #include <util/delay.h>

00044 /**************************************************************************
00045 * DEFINITIONS
00046 **************************************************************************/
00047 #define ENABLE_ALL_INTERRUPTS()     sei()                   
00048 #define DISABLE_IRQS    unsigned char _sreg = SREG; cli();  
00049 #define ENABLE_IRQS     { if(_sreg & 0x80) sei(); }         
00052 #define CONFIGURE_INT0()            {           \
00053           EICRA |= (1<<ISC01);      /* Enable Int0 falling edge */    \
00054           EICRA &= ~(1<<ISC00);     /* Enable Int0 falling edge */    \
00055           EIMSK |= (1<<INT0);       /* Enable Int0 */                 \
00056      }
00057 
00059 #define DISABLE_RX_INT()            {           \
00060           EIMSK &= ~(1<<INT0);                  \
00061      }
00062 
00064 #define ENABLE_RX_INT()             {           \
00065           EIFR   = (1<<INTF0);                  \
00066           EIMSK |= (1<<INT0);                   \
00067      }
00068 
00069 #define INIT_EIB_TIMER(vala,valb) { \
00070           TCCR0A = (1<<WGM01);     /*  CTC mode  */ \
00071           OCR0A = vala  ;  /* duration of one bit */ \
00072           OCR0B = valb  ;  \
00073      } 
00074 
00075 #define START_EIB_TIMER(value) { \
00076           TCNT0  = value             ;            /* set start value */ \
00077           TIFR0  = (1<<OCF0A)|(1<<OCF0B) ;        /* clear pending interrups */ \
00078           TIMSK0 = (( 1<<OCIE0A )|( 1<<OCIE0B )); /* enable OCRA, OCRB interrupts */  \
00079           TCCR0B = (1<<CS01) ;                    /* start the timer, prescaler :8, increment each 1 µsec */ \
00080     }
00081 
00082 #define STOP_EIB_TIMER() { \
00083           TCCR0B = 0;      \
00084           TIMSK0 = 0;      \
00085     }
00086 
00087 #define SLOW_EIB_TIMER() \
00088           TCCR0B |=  (1<<CS00);
00089 
00090 #define NORMAL_EIB_TIMER() \
00091           TCCR0B &= ~(1<<CS00);
00092  
00093 
00095 #define TIMER1_OVERRUN              (TIFR1 & (1U<<OCF1A))
00096 
00098 #define CLEAR_TIMER1_OVERRUN        TIFR1  = (1U<<OCF1A)
00099 
00101 #define RELOAD_APPLICATION_TIMER()  {                                   \
00102           TCCR1A = 0;             /* CTC (Clear Timer on Compate match) */ \
00103           TCCR1B = (1U<<WGM12)|(1U<<CS11)|(1U<<CS10); /* CTC-mode, prescale to 64 */ \
00104           OCR1A  = 16249;         /* every 130 ms OCR1A=(delay*F_CPU)/(prescaler)-1 */ \
00105           TCNT1  = 0;             /* reset timer */                     \
00106      }
00107 
00117 #define ENABLE_PWM(x)               {                                   \
00118           TCCR2A = (1<<WGM20)|(1<<COM2A1)|(1<<COM2A0);/* Phase correct PWM and enable OC2a pin */ \
00119           TCCR2B = (1<<CS20);     /* prescaler 0 */                     \
00120           TCNT2  = 0;             /* reset timer2 */                    \
00121           OCR2A  = (x);           /* defines the duty cycle */          \
00122      }
00123 
00125 #define DISABLE_PWM()               {                                   \
00126           TCCR2A &= ~((1<<COM2A1)|(1<<COM2A0)); /* disable PWM pin  */  \
00127           SETPIN_CTRL(ON);                     /* set port to high */   \
00128      }
00129 
00131 #define ENABLE_UART_TX_IRQ()        {                            \
00132           UCSR0B |= (1<<TXCIE0);       /* enable transmit IRQ */ \
00133      }
00134 
00136 #define DISABLE_UART_TX_IRQ()       {                                 \
00137           UCSR0B &= ~(1<<TXCIE0);      /* disable transmit IRQ */     \
00138      }
00139           
00141 #define UART_SEND_BYTE(tx_char)     {           \
00142           UDR0 =(uint8_t)(tx_char);             \
00143      }
00144 
00146 #define ENABLE_WATCHDOG(x)          {           \
00147           wdt_enable(x);                        \
00148      }
00149 
00150 
00152 #define DISABLE_WATCHDOG()          {           \
00153           MCUSR = 0;                            \
00154           wdt_disable();                        \
00155      }
00156 
00160 #define CONFIG_EEPROM() {                       \
00161         EECR |= (1 << EEPM1);                   \
00162         EECR &= ~(1 << EEPM0);                  \
00163     }
00164 
00166 #define ENABLE_EEPROM_READY_INT()   {           \
00167         EECR |= (1U<<EERIE);                    \
00168     }
00169     
00171 #define DISABLE_EEPROM_READY_INT()   {           \
00172         EECR &= ~(1U<<EERIE);                    \
00173     }
00174 
00175 // map interrupts
00177 #define SIG_UART_TRANS              USART_TX_vect
00178 
00179 #define EE_RDY_vect                 EE_READY_vect
